TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
I have taken the Sorcerer prisoner.
I have taken the Sorcerer prisoner.
I have taken the Sorcerer prisoner.
I have taken the Sorcerer prisoner.
Good. So, now we head north?
Good. So, now we head north?
Good. So, now we head north?
Good. So, now we head north?
The deal was that he be brought to justice. That has not happened yet.
The deal was that he be brought to justice. That has not happened yet.
The deal was that he be brought to justice. That has not happened yet.
The deal was that he be brought to justice. That has not happened yet.
But...
But...
But...
But...
Come. Follow me. We will talk more when we reach Gallia.
Come. Follow me. We will talk more when we reach Gallia.
Come. Follow me. We will talk more when we reach Gallia.
Come. Follow me. We will talk more when we reach Gallia.
